text: NGC 2014 is a red emission nebula surrounding an open cluster of stars in the Great Magellanic Cloud, at a distance of about 163,000 light-years. The nebula was discovered on 3 August 1826 by James Dunlop.Seligman Together with NGC 2020 it makes up what is called the Cosmic Reef. == References == Category:Emission nebulae Category:Large Magellanic Cloud 2014
title: NGC 2014
